column3: Traffic; Sihanoukville: On the morning of May 8
column5: a road accident occurred in Village 1
column9: leaving one person dead.------Police said the accident was caused when a HONDA AIRBLADE ridden by a Chinese man named LI YOUPAN
column11: hit the curb at high speed. He was killed instantly.------The authorities have taken the body to Preah Sihanouk province Referral Hospital waiting for families and the embassy. ------http://www.phnompenhreporter.com/article/77947
